title: Issues with relieving myself, urine left in canal & may come out during wudu, valid? assim al hakeem
transcript: I'm having some problems with defecating while defecating sometimes I can't get completely empty therefore I have to push myself to get empty while pushing myself I notice that I also push myself from the front part and after urinating I noticed that some urine is being left in my canel because of pushing myself and as I understand as I understand and you may come out while doing hudo or praying what should I do nothing when after you finish defecating and pushing yourself you are not responsible for what remains in the uh uh passage of your um private part meaning the urine because if urine is not coming out naturally and you don't see any urine coming just overwhelm the whole area with water sprinkle your underwear and move on
